text: A Face in the Crowd is a 1957 American drama movie. It was directed by Elia Kazan. The movie is based on the short story Your Arkansas Traveler by Budd Schulberg. Actors include Andy Griffith, Walter Matthau, Patricia Neal, Lee Remick, and Anthony Franciosa. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Elia Kazan Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in Arkansas Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Tennessee Category:Movies about advertising Category:Movies about radio people Category:Movies about television Category:Movies about television people Category:Movies about musicians
title: A Face in the Crowd
